item.title: Art
item.description: I enjoy creating and viewing patterns which roughly fit into the term Concrete Art. A project I have created for this purpose is konstrukt. I use it to implement different patterns as SVGs which makes them scaleable and easy to recoulor for me.

item.title: Talks
item.description: This is a list of talks I have given at various (online) conferences & webinars. How we clean up our murders - postmortems | Software Circus | Youtube How Security Evolves with your Kubernetes Footprint | Giant Swarm Webinar | Youtube How Security Evolves with your Kubernetes Footprint | KubeSec Online | Behind signup wall Kubernetes-Operator: Was ist das und wozu sind sie gut? | ContainerConf Online | No public video Our Road to Cluster API Adoption | Destination Decentralization | KongHQ How Postmortems help hardening our k8s clusters | DevOps Gathering 2020 | Youtube Testable Kubernetes Operators | DevOps Gathering 2020 | Youtube

item.title: About Me
item.description: Currently a Platform Engineer at Giant Swarm - passionate about Kubernetes operators and release engineering. I try to share experiences through talks at different conferences.
